newsitem.title: FRANCE: France to sell 300 to 500 mln Ecu OATs Wednesday.
newsitem.headline: France to sell 300 to 500 mln Ecu OATs Wednesday.

text.p: France is to offer between 300 and 500 million Ecu of government bonds (OATs) at its next scheduled auction on May 7, the Treasury said on Monday.
The Treasury will offer the current 10-year benchmark OAT, the 5.50 percent April 25, 2007 OAT, with a payment date of May 21, the statement said.
The auction is being held on Wednesday because Thursday is a holiday in France.
